original_text: The ruler of Cyprus was called Sergius Paulus. Bar-Jesus was his friend. Sergius Paulus understood things well. So he asked Barnabas and Saul to come to him. He wanted them to tell him God's message.
korean_text: 그가 총독 서기오 바울과 함께 있으니 서기오 바울은 지혜 있는 사람이라 바나바와 사울을 불러 하나님의 말씀을 듣고자 하더라

sentences.original_text: The ruler of Cyprus was called Sergius Paulus.
So he asked Barnabas and Saul to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 바나바와 사울을 자신에게 오라고 청했다.

sentences.original_text: He wanted them to tell him God's message.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 하나님의 메시지를 말해주기를 원했다.
